meanings.definition: Worth the time, effort, or money spent; of value or importance.
meanings.sent1: The movie was worthwhile because it entertained us for hours.
meanings.sent2: Studying for the exam proved to be a worthwhile investment in my future.
meanings.sent3: It was a worthwhile challenge to try and finish the puzzle in under an hour.
meanings.sent4: Her advice was so worthwhile that it felt like finding a treasure map.
meanings.sent5: The breathtaking view from the mountaintop made the hike completely worthwhile.
